subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=るい<るゐ
|kanon=るい<るゐ
|on=らい
|kun=たぐ-い<たぐ-ひ, たぐ-う<たぐ-ふ, たぐ-える<たぐ-へる, に-る, おおよそ-<おほよそ-, おおむね-<おほむね-
|nanori=とも, なお, なし, よし
}}

subSections.title: Notes
subSections.text:
* As in historical readings "すゐ", "ずゐ", "つゐ", and "ゆゐ", most dictionaries do not have "るゐ", as a historical reading for 類. According to historical data, the on-reading of 類 is the modern "るい". However, the Dai Kanwa Jiten, has the "るゐ" and related -wi historical on-readings.
{{attention|ja|please confirm this, this is translated from the Japanese Wikipedia}}

subSections.title: Compounds
